title: Official petition to restore Thornmail, Randuin's, and Frozen Heart
body:
This is the official petition to undo the nerfs on {{item:3075}} {{item:3143}} and {{item:3110}} 

Seriously Riot. Every single champ that gets reworked recently has some way of flat out ignoring defenses. Whether it be true damage or passive armor shreds. 

{{champion:86}} {{champion:114}} get %max HP true damage

{{champion:41}} ignores 40% of armor on his barrels

{{champion:122}} gets a passive 25% armor shred **and** a massive true damage ult

You (Riot) gave these champs these mechanics and buffed them so that they would become popular. These defensive items are now horribly gold inefficient for the meta that you have created in top lane. These are the items that are traditionally built early on various top laners. You've created a top lane meta where defenses get ignored while nerfing defensive items. Add this to the fact that these are the best items for also dealing with Sated Devourer.

It's time to undo those item nerfs Riot.

having 400 armor,78% resistance does 60 damage to the user + 15% of the incoming damage. Botrk gives max%hp damage and 10% lifesteal while bloodthirster gives 20% lifesteal,so its rather ineffective now. we haven't even mentioned how useless it is with armor penetration.

nope. The 15% damage return is before mitigation, meaning if you get hit for 1000 damage it will return 150+25% of your current armor.

Lifesteal on the other hand is based on how much damage is dealt after mitigation and then calculates the healing return off of that amount.

What does that mean without crazy complex math?  you are hit by an auto attack that crit to deal 1000 damage before mitigation but deals 400 damage after mitigation.

Thornmails effect activates and returns 15% of the damage of the attack before mitigation (aka 150) in addition to dealing an extra 25% of however much armor 60% physical reduction is (lets just round it to 50 even though it is probably more). total damage returned? 200

The attackers lifesteal kicks in and heals them for 20% of 400 damage, which is 80 health.

thornmail hits for 200 damage and they get healed for 80 health = they are still taking 120 damage without factoring in magic resistance (closer to 95 if you did)

lets take the same situation with old thornmail and its 30% return of damage taken. attacker still has 20% lifesteal and hits you for 1000 damage reduced to 400 after mitigation.

Old thornmail did not look at the damage before mitigation and instead calculated off damage after mitigation and so returns 120 damage

The attacker still returns 80 health from the 400 damage they deal.

old thornmail hits for 120 and they heal 80 from lifesteal = they only take 40 damage (closer to 30 after resistances)

so you tell me, would you rather have thornmail return 120/95 damage or 40/30 damage

######by the way 25% of 400 is 100, not 60. Also armor penetration like last whisper and yomuus does not effect your damage calculated from armor, Debuffs however do so BC would reduce that return. Bork does not deal %**max** hp damage either, you need to read the items more closely.
